attributes.action: Stop MPs Playing The Race Card After Making Fools Of Themselves On TV
attributes.background: Members of Parliament who take part in television or radio shows and make fools of themselves should not complain and play the race card.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
